metadata.Title: CVE-2020-8161 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - low
metadata.Description:
A directory traversal vulnerability exists in rack < 2.2.0 that allows anattacker perform directory traversal vulnerability in the Rack::Directoryapp that is bundled with Rack which could result in information disclosure.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-8161` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ruby-rack - 2.1.1-5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ruby-rack package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.1.1-5').
